description:
If you live in the greater Detroit metro region and you are struggling to stay afloat financially because of too much debt, you can turn to the Law Offices of Walter Metzen & Associates for the quality representation you need to find the relief you seek.

I am bankruptcy attorney Walter A. Metzen, and for more than 20 years, I have helped the good people of Michigan wipe their slates clean and get a fresh start on rebuilding a stable financial future. Board certified as a specialist in consumer bankruptcy, I have personally handled tens of thousands of bankruptcy cases on behalf of individuals and families across the state, and my law firm has become a reliable source for personalized, affordable legal counsel to people during their most dire times of need.

When you work with my law firm, you will work directly with an experienced, local attorney who has your best interests at heart. I will sit with you one-on-one and discuss your situation so that I can offer the most relevant advice about the options you have available. Understanding the stress and anxiety you are likely feeling about your circumstances, I will do all I can to set your mind at ease, and I will remain accessible to address your questions and concerns as they arise.

Recognized for my professionalism and service, I have received numerous awards and honors, including 10 out of 10 ratings on Avvo, as well as the site's Clients' Choice Award. To begin the process of eliminating your debt and securing a brighter future for yourself and your family, you can contact the Law Offices of Walter Metzen & Associates to schedule a free initial consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
